entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 10:39 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NE 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
